name: Space Invader
shortDescription: Remake of the first game I made in Unity
longDescription:
My first self-created project. Please feel free to leave a review below, or any (bugs, improvement, feature) that I can update on.
I would be glad if anyone of you enjoys this game!
Credit:
MUSIC:
Menu BGM: https://nicolemariet.itch.io/spy-8-bit-16-bit by Nicole Marie T
In-game BGM: https://big58.itch.io/8bit-ost-the-saga by BIG58
SFX: https://kronbits.itch.io/freesfx by Kronbits
GRAPHICS
8*8 SPACE SHOOTER ASSET https://gvituri.itch.io/space-shooter by Gustavo Vituri
Pixel Planets https://faktory.itch.io/pixel-planets by FaKtory Games

name: GroWhaos
longDescription:
As the first GameDev youtuber I watched, I really appreciate his many great and useful content on how to make games, and most importantly, how to have fun during the process. Although Brackeys has already left Youtube for a while, I always hope to join his game jam, to make SOMETHING with the fellow developers.
This is the first game jam I participated. Producing a THING in several days is not easy, but the developing process is really fun and I will join more game jam in the future!
It is suggested to play in standalone app, playing in web might have laggy issues.
